item.title: Comment on Frizty – Pet Shop WooCommerce Theme by Carmelina
item.dc:creator: Carmelina
item.description: Customer Support is top notch with the owner of this theme, they answer any questions you may have super fast!! I would give them a 10 star if I could. Thankyou for you amazing support. Carmelina
item.content:encoded: Customer Support is top notch with the owner of this theme, they answer any questions you may have super fast!! I would give them a 10 star if I could. Thankyou for you amazing support. Carmelina

item.title: Comment on Tectxon – Industry & Factory WordPress Theme by TemplatesMall
item.dc:creator: TemplatesMall
item.description: This is the best theme I have ever used! A special thanks to support and designer, absolutely fast and good helpful. Thanks to team !!! Recommend theme and features.
item.content:encoded: This is the best theme I have ever used! A special thanks to support and designer, absolutely fast and good helpful. Thanks to team !!! Recommend theme and features.

item.title: Comment on Tectxon – Industry & Factory WordPress Theme by Delicwebtech
item.dc:creator: Delicwebtech
item.description: Without question, the easiest and most powerful Theme I have used for WordPress. Everything I have wanted to make with this theme for my clients has been possible and I have full control of the design throughout all breakpoints in the template ad the pages. Great work Themetechmount.
item.content:encoded: Without question, the easiest and most powerful Theme I have used for WordPress. Everything I have wanted to make with this theme for my clients has been possible and I have full control of the design throughout all breakpoints in the template ad the pages. Great work Themetechmount.

item.title: Comment on Tectxon – Industry & Factory WordPress Theme by marco_baruffato
item.dc:creator: marco_baruffato
item.description: They are kind, perfect and fast in supporting me. I had a problem with the installation of the plugins and template. They solve it very soon. It's fantastic!
